atk-s0502a19:2_0: Natena hotīti imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ satthā jetavane viharanto vinicchayamahāmatte ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a19:3_0: Ekadivasañhi bhikkhū sāvatthiyaṁ uttaradvāragāme piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā nagaramajjhena vihāraṁ āgacchanti.
atk-s0502a19:3_2: Te sammukhāgataṁ vinicchayasālaṁ pavisitvā vinicchayamahāmatte lañjaṁ gahetvā sāmike asāmike karonte disvā “aho ime adhammikā,
atk-s0502a19:3_3: mayaṁ pana ‘ime dhammena vinicchayaṁ karontī’ti saññino ahumhā”ti cintetvā vasse vigate vihāraṁ gantvā
atk-s0502a19:3_4: satthāraṁ vanditvā ekamantaṁ nisinnā tamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
atk-s0502a19:3_7: chandādivasikā hutvā sāhasena atthaṁ vinicchinantā dhammaṭṭhā nāma honti,
atk-s0502a19:3_8: aparādhaṁ pana anuvijjitvā aparādhānurūpaṁ asāhasena vinicchayaṁ karontā eva dhammaṭṭhā nāma hontī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a19:5_0: “Na tena hoti dhammaṭṭho, yenatthaṁ sāhasā naye;
atk-s0502a19:6_0: Yo ca atthaṁ anatthañca, ubho niccheyya paṇḍito.
atk-s0502a19:10_1: Dhammaṭṭhoti rājā hi attano kātabbe vinicchayadhamme ṭhitopi dhammaṭṭho nāma na hoti.
atk-s0502a19:10_4: Sāhasā nayeti chandādīsu patiṭṭhito sāhasena musāvādena viniccheyya.
atk-s0502a19:10_5: Yo hi chande patiṭṭhāya ñātīti vā mittoti vā musā vatvā asāmikameva sāmikaṁ karoti,
atk-s0502a19:10_6: dose patiṭṭhāya attano verīnaṁ musā vatvā sāmikameva asāmikaṁ karoti,
atk-s0502a19:10_7: mohe patiṭṭhāya lañjaṁ gahetvā vinicchayakāle aññavihito viya ito cito ca olokento musā vatvā “iminā jitaṁ,
atk-s0502a19:10_9: bhaye patiṭṭhāya kassacideva issarajātikassa parājayaṁ pāpuṇantassāpi jayaṁ āropeti,
atk-s0502a19:10_11: Eso dhammaṭṭho nāma na hotīti attho.
atk-s0502a19:10_13: Ubho niccheyyāti yo pana paṇḍito ubho atthānatthe vinicchinitvā vadati.
atk-s0502a19:10_19: Dhammassa guttoti so dhammagutto dhammarakkhito dhammojapaññāya samannāgato medhāvī vinicchayadhamme ṭhitattā dhammaṭṭhoti pavuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a19:14_0: Na tena paṇḍito hotīti imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ satthā jetavane viharanto chabbaggiye ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a19:15_0: Te kira vihārepi gāmepi bhattaggaṁ ākulaṁ karontā vicaranti.
atk-s0502a19:15_1: Athekadivase bhikkhū gāme bhattakiccaṁ katvā āgate dahare sāmaṇere ca pucchiṁsu – “kīdisaṁ, āvuso,
atk-s0502a19:15_6: ime paharitvā sīse kacavaraṁ ākiritvā nīharissāmā”ti vatvā amhe piṭṭhiyaṁ gahetvā kacavaraṁ okirantā bhattaggaṁ ākulaṁ akaṁsūti.
atk-s0502a19:15_7: Bhikkhū satthu santikaṁ gantvā tamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
atk-s0502a19:15_11: kheminaṁ pana averīnaṁ abhayameva paṇḍitoti vadāmī”ti vatvā imaṁ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a19:17_0: “Na tena paṇḍito hoti, yāvatā bahu bhāsati;
atk-s0502a19:19_0: Tattha yāvatāti yattakena kāraṇena saṅghamajjhādīsu bahuṁ katheti,
atk-s0502a19:19_2: Yo pana sayaṁ khemī pañcannaṁ verānaṁ abhāvena averī nibbhayo,
atk-s0502a19:19_3: yaṁ vā āgamma mahājanassa bhayaṁ na hoti,
atk-s0502a19:23_0: Na tāvatāti imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ satthā jetavane viharanto ekudānattheraṁ nāma khīṇāsavaṁ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a19:24_0: So kira ekakova ekasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe viharati, ekamevassa udānaṁ paguṇaṁ –
atk-s0502a19:29_0: So kira uposathadivasesu sayameva dhammassavanaṁ ghosetvā imaṁ gāthaṁ vadati.
atk-s0502a19:29_2: Athekasmiṁ uposathadivase pañcapañcasataparivārā dve tipiṭakadharā bhikkhū tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṁ agamaṁsu.
atk-s0502a19:29_3: So te disvāva tuṭṭhamānaso “sādhu vo kataṁ idha āgacchantehi,
atk-s0502a19:29_4: ajja mayaṁ tumhākaṁ dhammaṁ suṇissāmā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a19:29_7: ayaṁ vanasaṇḍo dhammassavanadivase devatānaṁ sādhukārasaddena ekaninnādo hotīti.
atk-s0502a19:29_12: dhammassavanadivase imasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe devatā mahantena saddena sādhukāraṁ dentīti vadesi,
atk-s0502a19:29_14: aññesu divasesu sādhukārasaddena ekaninnādo eva hoti,
atk-s0502a19:29_15: na ajja pana jānāmi “kimeta”nti. “Tena hi, āvuso,
atk-s0502a19:29_17: So bījaniṁ gahetvā āsane nisinno tameva gāthaṁ vadesi.
atk-s0502a19:29_19: Atha nesaṁ parivārā bhikkhū ujjhāyiṁsu “imasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe devatā mukholokanena sādhukāraṁ dadanti,
atk-s0502a19:29_20: tipiṭakadharabhikkhūsu ettakaṁ bhaṇantesupi kiñci pasaṁsanamattampi avatvā ekena mahallakattherena ekagāthāya
atk-s0502a19:29_22: Tepi vihāraṁ gantvā satthu tamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
atk-s0502a19:30_2: yo bahumpi uggaṇhati vā bhāsati vā,
atk-s0502a19:30_4: Yo pana ekampi gāthaṁ uggaṇhitvā saccāni paṭivijjhati,
atk-s0502a19:30_5: ayaṁ dhammadharo nāmā”ti vatvā dhammaṁ desento imaṁ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a19:33_0: Yo ca appampi sutvāna, dhammaṁ kāyena passati;
atk-s0502a19:34_0: Sa ve dhammadharo hoti, yo dhammaṁ nappamajjatī”ti.
atk-s0502a19:35_0: Tattha yāvatāti yattakena uggahaṇadhāraṇavācanādinā kāraṇena bahuṁ bhāsati,
atk-s0502a19:35_3: Yo ca appampīti yo pana appamattakampi sutvā dhammamanvāya atthamanvāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hutvā
atk-s0502a19:35_6: Yo dhammaṁ nappamajjatīti yopi āraddhavīriyo hutvā ajja ajjevāti paṭivedhaṁ ākaṅkhanto dhammaṁ nappamajjati,
atk-s0502a19:39_0: Natena thero so hotīti imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ satthā jetavane viharanto lakuṇḍakabhaddiyattheraṁ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a19:40_0: Ekadivasañhi tasmiṁ there satthu upaṭṭhānaṁ gantvā pakkantamatte tiṁsamattā āraññikā bhikkhū taṁ passantā eva āgantvā satthāraṁ vanditvā nisīdiṁsu.
atk-s0502a19:40_1: Satthā tesaṁ arahattūpanissayaṁ disvā imaṁ pañhaṁ pucchi –
atk-s0502a19:40_13: Yo pana saccāni paṭivijjhitvā mahājanassa ahiṁsakabhāve ṭhito,
atk-s0502a19:40_14: ayaṁ thero nāmā”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a19:42_0: “Na tena thero so hoti, yenassa palitaṁ siro;
atk-s0502a19:45_0: “Yamhi saccañca dhammo ca, ahiṁsā saṁyamo damo;
atk-s0502a19:46_0: Sa ve vantamalo dhīro, thero iti pavuccatī”ti.
atk-s0502a19:47_2: Moghajiṇṇoti anto therakarānaṁ dhammānaṁ abhāvena tucchajiṇṇo nāma.
atk-s0502a19:47_3: Yamhi saccañca dhammo cāti yamhi pana puggale soḷasahākārehi paṭividdhattā catubbidhaṁ saccaṁ,
atk-s0502a19:47_4: ñāṇena sacchikatattā navavidho lokuttaradhammo ca atthi.
atk-s0502a19:47_7: yamhi pana catubbidhāpi appamaññābhāvanā atthīti attho.
atk-s0502a19:47_11: Theroti so imehi thirabhāvakārakehi samannāgatattā theroti vuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a19:51_0: Navākkaraṇamattenāti imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ satthā jetavane viharanto sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a19:52_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye dahare ceva sāmaṇere ca attano dhammācariyānameva cīvararajanādīni veyyāvaccāni karonte disvā ekacce therā cintayiṁsu –
atk-s0502a19:52_3: Yaṁnūna mayaṁ satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadeyyāma, ‘bhante,
atk-s0502a19:52_5: aññesaṁ santike dhammaṁ uggaṇhitvāpi imesaṁ santike asodhetvā mā sajjhāyitthāti daharasāmaṇere āṇāpethā’ti.
atk-s0502a19:53_0: Satthā tesaṁ vacanaṁ sutvā “imasmiṁ sāsane paveṇivaseneva evaṁ vattuṁ labhati,
atk-s0502a19:53_1: ime pana lābhasakkāre nissitāti ñatvā ahaṁ tumhe vākkaraṇamattena sādhurūpāti na vadāmi.
atk-s0502a19:53_2: Yassa panete issādayo dhammā arahattamaggena samucchinnā,
atk-s0502a19:53_3: eso eva sādhurūpo”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a19:56_0: Sādhurūpo naro hoti, issukī maccharī saṭho.
atk-s0502a19:60_2: Naroti ettakeneva kāraṇena paralābhādīsu issāmanako pañcavidhena maccherena samannāgato kerāṭikabhāvena saṭho naro sādhurūpo na hoti.
atk-s0502a19:60_3: Yassa cetanti yassa ca puggalassetaṁ issādidosajātaṁ arahattamaggañāṇena samūlakaṁ chinnaṁ,
atk-s0502a19:60_5: so vantadoso dhammojapaññāya samannāgato sādhurūpoti vuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a19:64_0: Namuṇḍakena samaṇoti imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ satthā sāvatthiyaṁ viharanto hatthakaṁ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a19:65_0: So kira vādakkhitto “tumhe asukavelāya asukaṭṭhānaṁ nāma āgaccheyyātha,
atk-s0502a19:65_1: vādaṁ karissāmā”ti vatvā puretarameva tattha gantvā “passatha,
atk-s0502a19:65_3: esova pana nesaṁ parājayo”tiādīni vatvā vādakkhitto aññenaññaṁ paṭicaranto vicarati.
atk-s0502a19:65_4: Satthā “hatthako kira evaṁ karotī”ti sutvā taṁ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, hatthaka,
atk-s0502a19:65_7: Evarūpañhi musāvādaṁ karonto sīsamuṇḍanādimatteneva samaṇo nāma na hoti.
atk-s0502a19:65_8: Yo pana aṇūni vā thūlāni vā pāpāni sametvā ṭhito,
atk-s0502a19:65_9: ayameva samaṇo”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a19:70_0: “Yo ca sameti pāpāni, aṇuṁ thūlāni sabbaso;
atk-s0502a19:72_1: Abbatoti sīlavatena ca dhutaṅgavatena ca virahito.
atk-s0502a19:72_2: Alikaṁ bhaṇanti musāvādaṁ bhaṇanto asampattesu ārammaṇesu icchāya pattesu ca lobhena samannāgato samaṇo nāma kiṁ bhavissati?
atk-s0502a19:72_3: Sametīti yo ca parittāni vā mahantāni vā pāpāni vūpasameti,
atk-s0502a19:72_4: so tesaṁ samitattā samaṇoti pavuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a19:76_0: Natena bhikkhu so hotīti imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṁ brāhmaṇaṁ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a19:77_0: So kira bāhirasamaye pabbajitvā bhikkhaṁ caranto cintesi –
atk-s0502a19:77_1: “samaṇo gotamo attano sāvake bhikkhāya caraṇena ‘bhikkhū’ti vadati,
atk-s0502a19:77_9: Na hi vissaṁ dhammaṁ samādāya vattanto bhikkhu nāma hoti.
atk-s0502a19:77_11: so bhikkhu nāmā”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a19:79_0: “Na tena bhikkhu so hoti, yāvatā bhikkhate pare;
atk-s0502a19:80_0: Vissaṁ dhammaṁ samādāya, bhikkhu hoti na tāvatā.
atk-s0502a19:83_0: Saṅkhāya loke carati, sa ve bhikkhūti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0502a19:84_1: tena bhikkhanamattena bhikkhu nāma na hoti.
atk-s0502a19:84_3: vissagandhaṁ vā kāyakammādikaṁ dhammaṁ samādāya caranto bhikkhu nāma na hoti.
atk-s0502a19:84_4: Yodhāti yo idha sāsane ubhayampetaṁ puññañca pāpañca maggabrahmacariyena bāhetvā panuditvā brahmacariyavā hoti.
atk-s0502a19:84_7: ime bāhirā”ti evaṁ sabbepi dhamme jānitvā carati,
atk-s0502a19:84_8: so tena ñāṇena kilesānaṁ bhinnattā “bhikkhū”ti vuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a19:88_0: Namonenāti imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ satthā jetavane viharanto titthiye ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a19:89_5: evarūpaṁ ṭhānaṁ gantuṁ na vaṭṭatī”tiādinā nayena maṅgalaṁ vatvā pakkamanti.
atk-s0502a19:89_6: Bhikkhū pana paṭhamabodhiyaṁ anumodanādīnaṁ ananuññātakāle bhattagge manussānaṁ anumodanaṁ akatvā pakkamanti.
atk-s0502a19:89_11: ito paṭṭhāya bhattaggādīsu yathāsukhaṁ anumodanaṁ karotha,
atk-s0502a19:89_15: Manussā anumodanādīni suṇantā ussāhappattā bhikkhū nimantetvā sakkāraṁ karontā vicaranti.
atk-s0502a19:89_17: samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakā bhattaggādīsu mahākathaṁ kathentā vicarantī”ti ujjhāyiṁsu.
atk-s0502a19:90_5: ekacce ‘mā no imaṁ atisayatthaṁ aññe jāniṁsū’ti maccherena.
atk-s0502a19:90_7: pāpavūpasamena pana muni nāma hotī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a19:93_0: Yo ca tulaṁva paggayha, varamādāya paṇḍito.
atk-s0502a19:95_0: “Pāpāni parivajjeti, sa munī tena so muni;
atk-s0502a19:96_0: Yo munāti ubho loke, muni tena pavuccatī”ti.
atk-s0502a19:97_0: Tattha na monenāti kāmañhi moneyyapaṭipadāsaṅkhātena maggañāṇamonena muni nāma hoti,
atk-s0502a19:97_4: Evarūpo hi tuṇhībhūtopi muni nāma na hoti.
atk-s0502a19:97_5: Atha vā monena muni nāma na hoti,
atk-s0502a19:97_6: tucchasabhāvo pana aviññū ca hotīti attho.
atk-s0502a19:97_7: Yo ca tulaṁva pagayhāti yathā hi tulaṁ gahetvā ṭhito atirekaṁ ce hoti, harati.
atk-s0502a19:97_10: Evameva yo atirekaṁ haranto viya pāpaṁ harati parivajjeti,
atk-s0502a19:97_12: Evañca pana karonto sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttivimuttiñāṇadassanasaṅkhātaṁ varaṁ uttamameva ādāya pāpāni akusalakammāni parivajjeti.
atk-s0502a19:97_13: Sa munīti so muni nāmāti attho.
atk-s0502a19:97_14: Tena so munīti kasmā pana so munīti ce?
atk-s0502a19:97_17: So munāti ubho loketi yo puggalo imasmiṁ khandhādiloke tulaṁ āropetvā minanto viya “ime ajjhattikā khandhā,
atk-s0502a19:97_18: ime bāhirā”tiādinā nayena ime ubho atthe munāti.
atk-s0502a19:97_19: Muni tena pavuccatīti tena kāraṇena munīti vuccatiyevāti attho.
atk-s0502a19:101_0: Na tena ariyo hotīti imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṁ ariyaṁ nāma bālisikaṁ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a19:102_0: Ekadivasañhi satthā tassa sotāpattimaggassūpanissayaṁ disvā sāvatthiyā uttaradvāragāme piṇḍāya caritvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto tato āgacchati.
atk-s0502a19:102_1: Tasmiṁ khaṇe so bālisiko balisena macche gaṇhanto buddhappamukhaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ disvā balisayaṭṭhiṁ chaḍḍetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a19:102_2: Satthā tassa avidūre ṭhāne nivattitvā ṭhito “tvaṁ kiṁ nāmosī”ti sāriputtattherādīnaṁ nāmāni pucchi.
atk-s0502a19:102_3: Tepi “ahaṁ sāriputto ahaṁ moggallāno”ti attano attano nāmāni kathayiṁsu.
atk-s0502a19:102_11: ariyā pana mahājanassa ahiṁsanabhāve ṭhitā”ti vatvā imaṁ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a19:104_0: “Na tena ariyo hoti, yena pāṇāni hiṁsati;
atk-s0502a19:106_4: Yo pana sabbapāṇānaṁ pāṇiādīhi ahiṁsanena mettādibhāvanāya patiṭṭhitattā hiṁsato ārāva ṭhito,
atk-s0502a19:107_0: Desanāvasāne bālisiko sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a19:110_0: Na sīlabbatamattenāti imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ satthā jetavane viharanto sambahule sīlādisampanne bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a19:111_11: Te sabbepi ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā nisinnā “api nu kho vo,
atk-s0502a19:111_13: pabbajitakiccaṁ matthakaṁ patta”nti satthārā puṭṭhā evamāhaṁsu – “bhante,
atk-s0502a19:111_15: tasmā ‘icchiticchitakkhaṇeyeva arahattaṁ pattuṁ samatthamhā’ti cintetvā viharāmā”ti.
atk-s0502a19:112_2: bhikkhunā nāma parisuddhasīlādimattakena vā anāgāmisukhappattamattakena vā ‘appakaṁ no bhavadukkha’nti vattuṁ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a19:112_3: āsavakkhayaṁ pana appatvā ‘sukhitomhī’ti cittaṁ na uppādetabba”nti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a19:119_0: Tattha sīlabbatamattenāti catupārisuddhisīlamattena vā terasadhutaṅgamattena vā.
atk-s0502a19:119_1: Bāhusaccena vāti tiṇṇaṁ piṭakānaṁ uggahitamattena vā.
atk-s0502a19:119_9: bhikkhu iminā sampannasīlādibhāvamattakeneva “mayhaṁ bhavo appako parittako”ti āsavakkhayasaṅkhātaṁ arahattaṁ
atk-s0502a19:119_10: appatto hutvā bhikkhu nāma vissāsaṁ nāpajjeyya.
atk-s0502a19:119_11: Yathā hi appamattakopi gūtho duggandho hoti,
atk-s0502a19:120_0: Desanāvasāne te bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahaṁsu, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
